babel-desc: Ka #babel hun-se̍k kong-lêng, hō͘ i oē chū-tōng sán-seng iōng-chiá ê kheng kap kā-kī ê pang-bô͘.
babel-autocreate-text-levels: Chia̍h-ê iōng-chiá thang kóng gú-giân $2, thêng-tō͘ $1 kip.
babel-0:
Chit-ê iōng-chiá [[$1|m̄-bat]] [[$2|$3]] (ia̍h-sī liáu-kái ū khùn-lân).
此个用者[[$1|毋捌]][[$2|$3]]（抑是了解有困難）。
babel-1:
Chit-ê iōng-chiá tha̍k-siá [[$2|$3]] ē lêng-le̍k sī [[$1|chho͘-téng]].
這个用者讀寫[[$2|$3]]的能力是[[$1|初等]]。
babel-2:
Chit-ê iōng-chiá tha̍k-siá [[$2|$3]] ē lêng-le̍k sī [[$1|tiong-téng]].
這个用者讀寫[[$2|$3]]的能力是[[$1|中等]]。
babel-3:
Chit-ê iōng-chiá tha̍k-siá [[$2|$3]] ē lêng-le̍k sī [[$1|ko-téng]].
這个用者讀寫[[$2|$3]]的能力是[[$1|高等]]。
babel-4:
Chit-ê iōng-chiá tha̍k-siá [[$2|$3]] ē lêng-le̍k [[$1|chiap-kīn bó-gú]].
這个用者讀寫[[$2|$3]]的能力[[$1|接近母語]]。
babel-5:
Chit-ê iōng-chiá tha̍k-siá [[$2|$3]] ē lêng-le̍k sī [[$1|choan-gia̍p]].
這个用者讀寫[[$2|$3]]的能力是[[$1|專業]]。
babel-N:
Chit-ê iōng-chiá ê [[$1|bó-gú]] sī [[$2|$3]].
這个用者的[[$1|母語]]是[[$2|$3]]。
babel-1-n: Chit-ê iōng-chiá tha̍k-siá [[$2|Bân-lâm-gú]] ê lêng-le̍k sī [[$1|chho·-kip]].
babel-2-n: Chit-ê iōng-chiá tha̍k-siá [[$2|Bân-lâm-gú]] ê lêng-le̍k sī [[$1|tiong-kip]].
babel-3-n: Chit-ê iōng-chiá tha̍k-siá [[$2|Bân-lâm-gú]] ê lêng-le̍k sī [[$1|ko-kip]].
babel-4-n: Chit-ê iōng-chiá tha̍k-siá [[$2|Bân-lâm-gú]] ē lêng-le̍k sī [[$1|chiap-kīn bó-gú]].
